name: Tanks For The Memories
description:
A four player Mech Tank game. Two players work together to control one Mech Tank! One person drives the tank, one person shoots the gun!

Controls:

Left Side of the Screen

Driver (Bottom Left)

WASD to move and rotate. Q and E to rotate camera left and right, Z and X to raise and lower.

Gunner (Top Left)

J and K to rotate the Turret left and right, O and L to raise and lower, Right CTRL to shoot

Right Side of the Screen

Driver (Bottom Right)

8456 on the Numpad to move and rotate. 7 and 8 to rotate camera left and right, 1 and 2 to raise and lower.

Gunner (Top Right)

Delete and End to rotate the Turret left and right, Page Up and Page Down to raise and lower, 0 on the Numpad to shoot
